Html: Is there a way I can make specific markers appear in front of other markers that were added later on. I currently have weather on the map which I add later and I also have an airplane bug which moves but when the bug arrives at the weather, it goes beneath the weather. I want it to stay on top of the weather.
What do you mean? I am using overlays but the overlays that I add later on, I want to add behind some of the markers that are already there, if possible?

I am using different overlays for all of the markers. What I am doing is adding the markers that show underneath again so they would show on top. Is that a bad technique or is there a way to just change the order of the added overlays?
the order you add is the order you get
